home.heading: Unlock the secrets of radiant skin and the essential insights of physiotherapy
home.name: Dr. Lina
home.scroll-text: Dive down to start the journey

about-me.line1: Welcome to Dr. Lina Hamzeh's official website.
about-me.line2: I am so glad you are here.
about-me.line3: I am Dr. Lina, a dedicated non-surgical Aesthetic Dermatologist. I'm your guide in addressing and treating various aesthetic skin conditions like acne, hyperpigmentation, melasma, rosacea, scars, wrinkles and sagging skin, atopic skin conditions like psoriasis and keratosis pilaris, hair and nail disorders, hyperhidrosis and many more.
about-me.line4: In addition, I am a Physiotherapist with 5+ years of experience, focusing on treating several musculoskeletal conditions like frozen shoulder, tendinitis, back and neck pain, degenerative disc diseases, fibromyalgia, myofascial pain syndrome, migraine, sports injuries, arthritis and a lot more. Besides, advanced therapy techniques are used during the session like dynamic cupping, acupuncture and electric acupuncture, advanced muscle recovery techniques, and auricular therapy. These techniques alleviate pain, enhance muscle recovery, improve body posture and balance, increase muscle performance and joint range of motion, and elevate vestibular function.
about-me.line5: We offer a comprehensive experience in wellness by mixing aesthetic medicine with physical health. You can discover all

exp1.position: Doctor in Dermoaesthetic and Facial Medicine
exp1.description: Specializing in Dermoaesthetic and Facial Medicine, professional in treating various aesthetic skin conditions such as hyperpigmentation, fine lines and wrinkles, acne scars, fat lipolysis, hair loss, tattoo removal, and rosacea, using non-surgical aesthetic techniques.

exp2.description: Specializing in Cosmetic dermatology by prescribing a full skincare or skin cure treatment routine based on cosmetic drugs or skin care products regarding skin type and skin condition like skincare routine for sensitive skin, oily skin, dry skin and skin cure routine to treat atopic skin, cellulite, acne, scars and much more.

exp3.description: Reliable Physical Therapist, passionate about helping people improve their mobility, enhance their quality of life, and prevent musculoskeletal injury. With 5+ years of experience as a physical therapist, I have recently expanded my practice as an acupuncturist and muscle recovery specialist.

edu1.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Dermoaesthetic and Facial Medicine (720 training hours)

edu2.degree: Professional Cosmetic Dermatology Diploma: Skin Care and Skin Cure
edu2.institution: ZmedCoach - first interactive medical and social educational platform in the Arab World
